label: Physical description
value: Shagreen (shark or ray skin), gilt copper

label: Provenance
value: Sarah Cooper Hewitt; 1931: acquired by Museum
Etui with Writing and Grooming Instruments

label: Description
value: Etui (a), with hinged lid, the whole of flattened oval form in section, tapering toward base; green ground diapered in raised white dots; raised white rococo scrolls framing five panels with mythological scenes in color:  Diana seated with standing dog; Venus standing with Cupid running with a bow, obelisk behind.  Fitted with ivory memo tablet (b), gilt copper pencil holder (c), gilt copper paper knife (d), gilt copper pen knife with steel blade (e), steel and gilt copper scissors (f), steel tweezers (g), and a gilt copper bodkin (h).

label: Physical description
value: Enamel on copper, gilt copper, steel, ivory, cut wood

label: Provenance
value: Sarah Cooper Hewitt; 1931: bequested to Museum

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Obverse shows a King returning from war being greeted by a group of women dancing and playing musical instruments. Trophies of musical instruments to the right and left. On the reverse, two women in a landscape setting. Sticks are carved (à jour), gilded and painted. At center are two couples: the men are standing, the women are seated. Red jewels set in each end of the pin.

label: Physical description
value: Skin leaf painted with gouache; carved, gilded and painted sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated fan with painted silk leaf. Obverse shows medallions containing putti with flower sprays in between. Center medallion has a frame of gold metallic sequins. The flowers have red spangles and gold sequins. Reverse has the same design drawn in red on unpainted silk. Stick are carved in an openwork design (à jour) with gilding, silver and inserts of gilded wire screen. Guards carry ovals medallions containing a blacksmith and spinner that are appliqued to under parts in relief and covered with glass.

label: Physical description
value: Silk leaf painted with gouache and embroidered with sequins and metallic thread; ivory sticks with wire screen and glass

label: Description
value: Pleated fan with painted paper leaf. Obverse mount shows a couple – the woman is seated, and the man stands under an arbor by a fountain with two bathing cupids. One cupid is shooting an arrow at the couple. In cartouches at either end are two cupids in monochrome. The reverse has a central monogram with cupids in cartouches at either end. Sticks are elaborately carved with openwork (à jour), painted and gilded. The center shows a naval battle, and on either side trophies and soldiers storming two towers with a cannon.

label: Physical description
value: Oil paint on paper leaf, carved and pierced ivory sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated cabriolet fan with painted parchment upper and lowers leaves. The obverse shows naval scenes with floral borders.The reverse leaf is painted paper showing a woman in a pastoral landscape, with a rustic house and fence on the lower leaf. The sticks are carved and pierced openwork (à jour) with Chinoiserie figures, painted and gilded. Paste jewel set in both ends of the rivet.

label: Physical description
value: Parchment and paper leaf, painted with gouache; pierced, painted and gilded ivory sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated fan with painted leaf. The obverse mount shows a pastoral scene with a central group of a woman and a boy with two putti, one holding a torch. To the left is a girl and boy near a tree and on the right, a child plays with a dog. Gilt border with urns and wreaths. The reverse shows a girl seated under a tree and has a pink and blue floral border. Sticks have carved openwork (à jour) with figures of a man, woman, and putti, silvered and gilt. Guards have oval medallions with portraits of a man and woman, each holding a fan in an articulated arm made of painted ivory that moves using a lever to cover and uncover the face.

label: Physical description
value: Parchment leaf painted with gouache; pierced and gilded ivory sticks with glass

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Linen leaf painted with gouache.  Design showing a central scene of a young man seated on a bench near a standing woman holding a long floral garland. A bird flies above them carrying a note in its beak. Altar of love at the left and a cartouche with trophies at right. Design outlined in silvered chain stitch. Embroidered with spangles. Gilt flourishes near the edges and gilt medallions on either side of the central scene. Sequins on trees and cartouche. Carved and gilded ivory sticks with silver and touches of red.

label: Physical description
value: Linen leaf painted with gouache and embroidered with metallic yarns in chain stitch and sequins; carved, incised and pierced ivory sticks with applied metallic foil

label: Description
value: Pleated fan with painted silk leaf showing background of flowers and displays of musical instruments. Three painted parchment inserts show winter scenes of provincial life. Central one is in full color with the outer ones in blue and white. Carved ivory sticks with silver and gilding.

label: Physical description
value: Silk leaf painted with gouache, with painted parchment medallions, gold and silver embroidery and spangles, ivory sticks with silver and gilt

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Narrow leaf with hand-colored lithograph on paper backed with painted parchment; sticks of carved and incised mother-of-pearl, washer and metal loop at the rivet. The obverse shows a garden party with a central cartouche of a gentlemen with two ladies. The reverse has a girl and boy playing a pipe. Both sides have a gilt border and decoration.

label: Physical description
value: Paper and parchment leaf with hand-colored lithograph, carved, painted and gilded mother-of-pearl sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated fan painted with a bull fighting scene showing a man leaping over a bull on a pole. The reverse has a man and two women in conversation. Sticks are mother-of-pearl carved à jour. Paste head on pin. White cord and tassel.

label: Physical description
value: Painted silk leaf, mother-of-pearl sticks, silk tassel

label: Description
value: Pleated fan with a gouache painted paper leaf showing the story of Vertumnus and Pomona by the well, with a putto reclining nearby. The ivory sticks are carved like a swimming dolphin with scales of silvered piqués. The guards have applied figures of soldiers in mother-of-pearl.

label: Physical description
value: Painted paper leaf, carved ivory sticks with inlaid metal pins and mother-of-pearl

label: Description
value: Brisé fan of plain ivory sticks except for the right guard which is carved with four chamois in high relief in a rocky and wooded setting.

label: Description
value: Pleated fan with  white gauze leaf painted on the obverse with a design of poppies. Sticks are carved wood with red and gilded poppies.

label: Physical description
value: Painted silk leaf, carved and gilded wood sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated fan with leaf of black Chantilly lace on white gauze. Sticks are plain tortoise shell.

label: Physical description
value: Silk lace mounted on silk gauze leaf; tortoise shell sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Leaf of white gauze with applied white taffeta, gilt and green spangles. Sticks are mother-of-pearl with gilt and green piqué. White cord and tassel.

label: Physical description
value: Silk leaf with applied motifs in silk and spangles, mother-of-pearl sticks with piqué, silk cord and tassel

label: Dimensions
value: H x W (open, with tassel): 53.3 × 41.9 cm (21 × 16 1/2 in.)

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Black lace leaf with black gauze insets, embroidered with steel cut beads and spangles. Sticks are carved and ornamented with steel (?) piqué. Black cord and tassel.

label: Physical description
value: Silk lace leaf with silk gauze, embroidered with steel cut beads and spangles, carved and piquéd ebony sticks, silk cord and tassel

label: Dimensions
value: H x W (open, without tassel): 38.1 x 67.9 cm (15 x 26 3/4 in.) H x W (tassel): 19.1 x 1.9 cm (7 1/2 x 3/4 in.)

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Pale blue satin leaf with a design on the obverse of a rustic bullfighting scene. Sticks are carved ebony with a portion carved à jour.

label: Physical description
value: Silk leaf painted with gouache, carved and pierced ebony sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Obverse shows a painted scene of a rural bullfight. Group of spectators to the right with a cart behind; to the left is a fence and a brook. Sticks are plain tortoise shell.

label: Physical description
value: Painted parchment leaf, tortoise shell sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Black silk leaf painted with a design of flowers on the obverse. Sticks have a flower and trellis design carved à jour.

label: Physical description
value: Painted silk leaf, carved and pierced ebony sticks

label: Description
value: Pleated fan. Obverse shows a bullfighting scene. Sticks are varnished light wood with a stamped gilt design.

label: Physical description
value: Paper leaf with chromolithograph, wood sticks stamped with gilt
